name: The Compactor
description:
You tried to flee through a waste chute.

Well... not the best idea.
Besides smelling awful, you are now trapped in a trash compactor.
Your goal is to delay the compactor walls until help arrives.

Gameplay

Try to delay the compactor walls by clamping scrap metal in between the walls or by hacking.
Beware of monsters, but no worries you got blasters.

I am interested which score you achieve.

Technical Details

The game was made in Unity (https://unity3d.com/). I made all the graphics myself, using GIMP (https://www.gimp.org/) and Pyxel Edit (https://pyxeledit.com/). All the sound effects were created with Bfxr (https://www.bfxr.net/). The music was created using Cubase (https://www.steinberg.net/de/shop/cubase.html).

Made by

Skosnowich
